item.title: HackerCast - 20251002 - Top 16 Stories
item.description:
Today's top Hacker News stories:
• Signal Protocol and Post-Quantum Ratchets • The strangest letter of the alphabet: The rise and fall of yogh • Launching Solveit – an antidote to AI fatigue • Babel is why I keep blogging with Emacs • Why most product planning is bad and what to do about it
